title: Dam Hooligans
short_desc: The crew pillages a local village on Rivalri-2 and finds themselves in a bit of a pickle.

content.text: t!8ball Did Seth manage to call up a friend to send in a stronger, more resilient replacement chassis for the Panty Slingshot and get it mostly intact after a couple of equinoxes?
🎱 | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Is Emmett currently idling around the campfire?
> 🎱 | Don't count on it, Zander.
Emmett sits away from the campfire, plucking grass out of the ground.
Y'know, this planet is comfy.
He tightens Seth's oversized fur coat.
Lush grass, forests for miles.
t!8ball does Lucian walk out to say hi?
> 🎱 | My reply is yes, Arky.
Lucian emerges from the ship's busted cryosleep chamber, walks over to Emmett, and sits down in the grass.
Hey, guys.
Oh! Lucian.
Emmett scoots over slightly in Lucian's direction.
Deyner leaps over Lucian and into the dirt opposite of him.
Hello! I believe we haven't met!
Deyner spits out dirt.
Seth holds a stick with a boar's snout attached.
Yeah, reminds me a lot of my home planet.
Garrick stares blanky at the bright sun.
Lucian Blackwater, nice to meet you.
Deyner holds his hand out to Lucian.
Deyner Revathen.
Lucian shakes his hand.
Deyner shakes his other hand, crossing his arms over.
We need to work on getting power on in the ship soon.
Seth pulls the pin on an anxiety grenade and chucks it behind him.
Dades is a great ship replacement guy, but we're a hundred thousand Ducketts in debt to him now. Getting the ship up and running would've been another hundred thousand.
Hector is shocked to see Lucian awake!
He wakes at last!
I'm getting tired of walking around in the dark to get to my room.
Garrick turns and looks at the needless explosion.
Okay, that was loud.
Emmett swirls around on his butt to look at Seth.
What?
In the dark?
Yeah, in the dark.
It's the middle of the day.
My name is Hector.
Hector holds all six arms out, and then laughs to himself.
Great observation Garrick.
Seth chucks the roasted boar snout at Garrick, where it gets swallowed by his pockets.
I'm assuming we're out of backup power in the ship?
Emmett walks over and sits on a log next to Seth.
He grabs a rodent corpse from Sanya's game pile and plunges a stick into it.
Deyner looks at Lucian's weapon and drools a bit in awe.
Woah! Nice weapon, who made this?
Yeah.
At night, it gets way too dark in that damn ship.
I haven't been in the ship this whole time.
So, I wouldn't know.
Garrick pokes his head between Seth and Emmett's.
Wouldn't it get hot in there?
Perhaps if you were to add new lights to the ship? The current ones are kinda old.
Lucian unsheaths his weapon.
My father did; a scythe made of the strongest metal found on our planet.
Lights were changed out before we got the ship.
Seth shrugs.
Power is out, though. We just need a new battery, Kyle's didn't last very long.
Emmett gives Seth a puzzled look.
We were using KYL's battery to power the ship?
Hmmm... if you want, I could check it out!
t!8ball Does Danny exit the ship and join the others around the campfire?
> 🎱 | Yes, definitely, Platinum_Pathos.
t!8ball Does Deyner look on a makeshift map of the planet?
> 🎱 | Better not tell you now, Deyner.
Danny exits the ship and begins his morning stretches.
Hello, world!
Deyner gives a small wave to Danny, tired of handshaking for the time being.
Hello...
I'm currently cooking a... rodent... thing...
Emmett tilts his head at the meat.
The berries here are extremely tart.
t!8ball Does Seth sit back and play with his lighter?
🎱 | As I see it, yes, Bagelwrecker.
Do you think we could cook a rubber squeaky toy?
Garrick takes out a squeaky toy and starts to honk it in Chomsky's ear deliberately.
Brilliant. Meat is a great part of a balanced meal!
So is rubber... but I may be biased.
Do you have one?
Emmett obviously doesn't know what rubber is.
Deyner gives a mild look at the mention of meat.
Eh... it's alright.
Deyner thinks about tossing a salad for lunch...
Also, be on the look out for a drow elf, she kinda wants to kill me.
Seth looks around in paranoia, then throws a nasty glance at Deyner.
Deyner looks offended!
Hey! I'm half Drow!
t!8ball does Garrick pull out a rubber squeaky toy and show Emmett?
> 🎱 | It is decidedly so, RPretribution.
Emmett beholds the squeaky toy, grimacing at its creepy clown-like appearance.
That's disturbing.
Garrick continues honking the squeaky toy in various people's ears.
Where did you keep that?
I don't think anyone really wants to know.
In my pockets, duh.
His butt.
...Do ghosts have butts?
No.
Garrick stares deep into Deyner's eyes.
t!8ball Does Emmett take the rodent and lay the stick on his legs to cool off?
> 🎱 | Very doubtful, Zander.
Well unfortunately, I don't care if you're half drow. I'm killing the first female drow I see on this planet.
We could have meat for a couple days if we kill one, too.
I'll freeze you before that happens.
Deyner puffs cold air in Seth's direction.
Emmett grimaces at the thought of eating another sentient being.
Cannibalism isn't really an option.
Okay, calm down, you two!
Seth, you're even more desperate than usual.
Except this time, for food.
Seth flicks a booger at Deyner nonchalantly.
Yes, freeze me because I defend myself. I don't want to deal with a dumb drow assassin tailing my ass.
My bad... I thought you were talking about eating me.
We have enough people, we could easily defend ourselves against a single assassin.
Not a problem.
Drow assassins are different though, cunning as hell and stealthy as fuck.
Emmett gives a grim expression.
Sounds like the Llamanians.
So, what happened? Last thing I remember is meeting a woman-horse thing.
Lucian takes out his scythe and tosses it in the air, grabbing it by its handle.
Deyner, would you be interested in a spar with me?
Except, not exactly stealthy...
Deyner smirks.
Then make it to where they can't hide, dummy!
Actually, I don't think they're at all alike.
Sure...
Deyner looks around for his swords.
Seth scoffs at Deyner and scratches his stubbled chin.
Willing to degrade their bodies in exchange for a kill...
Hector butts in on the conversation, resting himself around the fire with the others.
It doesn't matter how stealthy they are, my drone can spot them!
Chomsky opens his eyes and holds his head from his hangover from the prior night. He happened to fall asleep around the campfire.
Hey guys... What are we talking about?
Oh, you know. The banking system.
Deyner rolls his eyes.
Chomsky tenses his brow.
Uh-huh.
Lucian readies his blade.
You ready?
Hector watches Lucian, unsure why he has his scythe out.
Ready for what?
Chomsky groans.
No, seriously...
What's going on?
Deyner finds his swords lying on the ground and grabs them, readying them for the battle ahead.
I don't know, are you?
Garrick takes out some pom-poms and cheers with them.
C'mon, guys! Let's go kill all the natives!
Danny salivates, always hungry for more food.
I just wanted the squirrel...
Hector puts two sets of arms on his hips.
Why don't we hunt animals instead of hunting the natives?
We can do both!
Garrick raises a pom-pom in excitement.
Danny groans.
Natives are usually bland anyways. I agree with Hector.
Chomsky stares at Garrick with a sorrowful expression.
You guys are harsh.
We're stranded on a random planet, Chonko.
Need to feed the tum tum.
Garrick pats his body.
I can see that!
So? What's the problem, then?
My drone could probably knock out enough animals to get food, guys.
t!8ball Does the Drow assassin show up?
🎱 | Very doubtful, Deyner.
Why are going to kill natives?!
Deyner examines his blades and holds out a finger.
One second, gotta sharpen these up.
He takes out a large dremal and starts to sharpen his swords.
We don't need to Chomsky, we can just hunt!
Emmett picks up the cooked rodent and looks over to Danny.
Danny, want to share?
Dannys licks his lips in anticipation.
Whatever works.
I would like that very much.
Hector takes out a drone.
What we need is someone with a strong enough filter in their mask to handle the gas while I knock out animals using my drones...
Wait, what gas?
Emmett rips the rodent body in half and hands over a half to Danny.
Here.
Hector shrugs.
Oh that's kind of my thing. Nothing lethal, just puts you to sleep for a while...
At least nothing lethal in my drones.
Hector laughs.
Danny grabs the rodent and practically inhales it, leaving only the bones left after a couple of seconds.
I very much appreciate it.
Deyner stops sharpening his swords.
If you give me the materials, I can make some masks.
Emmett gasps in awe at Danny's display of carnal hunger.
No problem....
Danny belches loudly.
You'll find plenty of plastic in my room...
I doubt we can find enough to make one for everyone, we'll need more money for that
Instead of entertaining Lucian's attempt to spar, Deyner starts to head back to the ship.
Emmett holds his rodent half with his two index digits, not wanting to get himself messy.
Seth, can you hand me a napkin or something?
I already have a mask.
Garrick grabs his mask with a finger and snaps it back on his own face.
Yeah, sure.
Seth reaches his arm out to Garrick, grabbing at his vest.
Garrick doesn't notice Seth's hand touching him.
It's great.
We can always steal the materials??
Garrick raises a pom-pom in excitement.
Now you're talking!
t!8ball Does hector go with Deyner to help him design a gas mask strong enough to withstand his gas?
🎱 | Don't count on it, MultiTheDuck.
Chomsky is beginning to lose interest in the others' scheme to gas a bunch of animals. He folds his arms and rolls his eyes.
Materials from where, exactly?
Danny belches.
Why would you steal my materials if I just offered them?
Did you guys even hear me? I said I have a bunch of plastic just strewn about my room.
Plus we don't all need a mask, Garrick is immune to pathogens after all.
Garrick blows a raspberry.
You don't know that.
Hector sits by the fire and watches as Deyner heads to his workshop.
Okay let me know how that goes Deyner. Come to me if you need any chemicals.
Deyner mumbles loudly as he gets to the worktable.
And my frost blood makes any pathogens that enter my body grow slowly...
Chomsky scoffs.
So you'll still die, just more slowly. Great.
Hector takes out his knockout dart and admires the vial inside of its translucent casing.
It's not exactly a pathogen, not this dart at least...
Garrick notices Seth digging in his pockets and he quickly flies away from him. He puts his hands on his hips.
Hey, hands off!
Before Garrick got away, Seth was able to grab a napkin from the ghost's pockets.
Here Emmett. Garrick's ass napkin. Nice and warm.
Seth hands over the napkin to Emmett.
Emmett grabs the napkin and uses it to hold his cooked morsel.
Uhm, Okay then.
Thanks.
Emmett picks at the morsel with his teeth, taking small bites at a time.
Hector tosses Deyner the dart.
Just don't break this, that would be bad.
Deyner stumbles forward and manages to catch the dart.
Not necessarily. If we get out in enough time we can make up a cure.
Hey. All of you.
He snaps in quick succession towards his crewmates, a half-eaten morsel still in his grasp.
We need money.
Garrick jerks his head at the sound.
Huh?
Seth groans.
We know.
Yes, we do.
How are we going to get some?
Honestly...
I gotta piss, though.
Seth begins jumping around, clutching his groin.
Emmett chucks the bones off the rocky terrain.
I just want to put that into your minds.
And Lucian, may I see your sycthe?
Deyner takes off his gloves.
Lucian hands his scythe to him.
Of course.
And of course, half of you aren't paying attention to the topic at hand.
Emmett facepalms.
Damnit.
Danny stands up on a nearby large rock for an announcement.
Guys, we are quite simply out of delectable food!
Unfortunately, we need money for that though.
I vote we find a way to make money.
Emmett speaks with his mouth full.
Ducketths spethifically.
I vote we find a way to steal money!
Garrick nearly tosses his food away in excitement.
I vote too.
Seth pulls out a judge's score sign with a '10' on it.
t!choose Everyone gets 1/16th of a burger from Garrick's pocket | the campfire spreads to Emmett's feet
🤔 | PlasmaPerson, I pick: the campfire spreads to Emmett's feet!
Any means necessary.
Danny pumps his fist in the air.
For the food!!!
Emmett doesn't notice the fire and rolls his eyes at Danny.
You garbage gut.
Dude, the campfire's getting you.
Chomsky takes a bite like nothing is wrong.
I can go hunting. Probably wouldn't be as effective as if had my drone, but I could probably find some decent animals.
Hector suddenly realizes that Emmett's on fire.
Emmett! Get away from the fire!
Emmett takes one last bite out of his morsel and looks down to his hoof.
Shit.
He starts to stamp out his hoof.
t!8ball Is Danny out of food in his room?
> 🎱 | You may rely on it, Platinum_Pathos.
Danny looks at the pile of crumbs where there used to be food and scowls.
Emmett successfully extinguishes the fire on his leg.
Should we steal Ducketts?
Chomsky shrugs.
Sounds like a plan to me.
From where?
Garrick peers out into the valley below.
Let's go look for civilization.
t!8ball Does Deyner start crafting a prototype mask?
🎱 | Better not tell you now, Deyner.
I'd prefer to stay on the positive side of the law, but if it's the only way...
Danny jumps from the rock he's standing on.
t!8ball Does Garrick head off in a random direction?
🎱 | Most likely, RPretribution.
Come on, let's goooooooo!
Emmett eyeballs Danny and tosses the bones from his food off the cliff.
I don't think there's a GU down here, buddies.
He slides down the cliff after Garrick, with the rest of the crew following suit.
Oh geez'!
Chomsky stumbles at the end of his slide, nearly falling over.
Garrick, you're gonna get us all lost!
Neither do I.
Seth dusts off his jeans.
I think we're right below jurisdiction!
Garrick waves the others down.
Hurry up!
I guess I'm not hunting then, okay!
Once he's finished sliding, Hector raises his legs up and scorpion runs on his arms after Garrick.
Deep in his craft, Deyner slams his table with his hammer, frustrated that he's unable to attach some parts of his mask together.
Gods fucking dammit why won't this thing work!?
t!8ball Does Emmett put on his goggles as he follows Garrick?
🎱 | Yes, definitely, Zander.
Wait up, you stupid ghost!
Chomsky runs off after Garrick towards a river.
Emmett calibrates his VIZO-2480 goggles and picks up some readings on organic lifeforms in the distance.
I think I can see something ahead...
t!8ball Did Seth remember to grab his backpack?
🎱 | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
Seth, in the back of the group with Emmett, watches as he messes with the goggles.
You wanna hike it, Emmett?
I'd like to bring up that we have no plan whatsoever, nor a place to steal Ducketts from!
Yeah. It's about a kilometer out in... that direction.
Emmett points in a direction a bit right of where Garrick is headed.
Once he catches up to Garrick, Hector lowers his legs and picks his torso back up.
Seth cups his hands over his mouth to make sure Garrick hears him.
We can probably make it in like ten minutes if we don't run it.
Then let's hurry up and get on with it!
Emmett stratches his wrist, a bit anxious over the prospect of stealing from the locals.
Yeah, let's go.
Chomsky's mouth gets slapped by Garrick as the spectre pivots in the direction Emmett mentioned. He furrows his brows and screams an Zielic obscenity.
@ԗݛ$ɍȝ$ɍȽ!
Zielic Translation: Snoteater!
Danny looks back at the camp on the cliff behind them.
So is anyone staying behind, or are we all headed out?
I hope we find a place that sells space weed or cigarettes...
I'm dying without a good smoke.
Emmett speaks into his watch.
Come on, Iris!
I guess Deyner is staying to make his mask.
Iris emerges from the ship, tripping as she rushes down the cliff to reach the others. She exclaims into her wrist, partially exhausted despite her long nap.
Where are we going?!
Hey guys, I finished one up!
He shakes newly completed mask in the air excitedly and puts it down to work on the next one.
Chomsky rolls his eyes after Emmett got Iris to follow them.
Emmett, I'm going to scream in your ear one day.
@ݛȽȽҐ. Śݛԗ'$ Þɍ ȝ ҜɍȽƟ ȝÞݛǼ$ Ͼ$.
Zielic Translation: Sorry. Don't be a jerk about it.
I feel like food may be slightly more important than drugs, Seth.
But not in a rocket ship...
Seth shrugs at Danny's comment.
Meh, we can get some of that too.
Emmett grabs ahold of Iris's hand once she catches up and moves ahead of the others.
C'mon, you sleepyhead!
Chomsky wrings a finger in his ear, trying to understand Garrick's Zielic response.
My toast is a little crusty?
Garrick flips Chomsky off.
This is what I mean.
Deyner's stomach grumbles.
Ugh, hungry...
But you didn't answer-
Iris sighs as she's dragged ahead.
Oh, alright.
Seth pushes Danny forward.
Don't need to get left behind, do we?
Chomsky rolls his eyes.
Riiiight...
Danny picks up the pace after being prodded by Seth.
Fine, onwards!
Emmett stops and admires Iris's face for a bit.
Want a piggyback ride?
Iris chuckles.
Yes.
Seth scoffs at the lovers' overt affection.
I can give you a piggyback ride, minus the piggyback...
He violently pushes his index finger in and out of his clasped hand.
Emmett crouches down, his tail wagging.
Hop on then!
Danny looks away from Seth in disgust.
I'll just ignore those comments.
Iris gets onto Emmett's back and leans her chin onto his horns as he stands up.
Garrick sighs as he continues leading the others.
Ͼ ïϾƟɍŚ $ɷɍ ݛ$ɷɍȽ ӴǼҐ. ɷɍ ǼԗŚɍȽ@$ݛݛŚ Њɍ.
Zielic Translation: I liked the other guy. He understood me.
Danny huffs as Iris piggybacks Emmett.
It's only a kilometer...
t!8ball Does Garrick find something of interest?
🎱 | Outlook not so good, RPretribution.
Seth speeds up, walking directly behind Emmett and Iris.
t!8ball Does the crew finally get there?
🎱 | Without a doubt, Zander.
Hector takes out his drone controller.
Garrick hold up, I could probably get a aerial view with my drone if you want to stand still for a second...
Ɣɷݛ'@ $ɷɍ ݛ$ɷɍȽ ӴǼҐ?
Zielic Translation: Who's the other guy?
Upon finishing another mask, Deyner looks up from his craft table and finds no one else.
Where did everybody go?
Emmett exhales, not used to carrying Iris around for longer distances.
That kilometer felt longer than it should have.
Danny laughs.
I think you just need to work out more.
Emmett realizes he's sweating. His sides and back are getting quite hot.
Iris, you're pretty warm right now.
Like, unusually.
Deyner shrugs and puts his masks down.
Time for some mischief, I guess.
Deyner sneaks into the ship and accesses Iris's tablet in her room.
Perfect...
He snoops around her messages and finds a mix of lewd pictures and texts between her and Emmett.
Oh my...
Deyner laughs sinisterly as he prints out some pictures and plasters them around Emmett's room.
t!choose Town | Stream | Giant Dam | Portside City | town next to stream | Beach | Old Campsite | Burnt Down forest | Mountainside town
🤔 | Bagelwrecker, I pick Stream!
Ͼ $ɷϾԗƟ ɷϾ@ ԗȝЊɍ Ɣȝ@ ȝЭЭɍȽ.
Zielic Translation: I think his name was Azzer.
Hector raises an eyebrow as he grabs his drone and turns it on.
I'm sorry, I don't speak ghost.
Chomsky looks at his reflection, scowls, and kicks the water.
Iris turns pink.
My bad... it's probably related to these veins...
Iris hangs her hands in front of Emmett's face, showing off her wrists. The veins pulsate red and orange.
They've been almost glowing all day...
Dannys giggles to himself.
Guns are more effective, Chomsky.
Seth sniffs his shoulder and nearly gags.
Meh, I need a bath.
After getting tired of posting images of Emmett's cock around his own room, Deyner decides to be helpful and starts to fix various appliances around the ship.
Emmett dips his hooves into the stream and looks down its length.
I think this stream leads to a dam, considering how deep this water gets.
Chomsky turns his scowl to Danny, but then looks away.
As Seth starts to take off his shirt, Danny grabs onto Seth in disapproval.
We didn't bring soap dude.
Seth sneers at Danny and lets go of his shirt.
It's possible.
Okay, let's see if I can find anything...
Hector tosses his drone up in the air and it begins to float up
Should we follow the stream?
Garrick floats, following the stream for a bit before finding the dam in the distance.
Yeah, looks to be a dam. Hope we can find something useful.
Emmett smiles up at Iris and heads down the stream.
Yeah, we'll go.
Iris's eyes sparkle.
A dam? Yes please!
What's the point of a dam in this situation?
Means civilization, dummy.
t!choose Dam | City | Forest | Nothing
Means there might be people nearby.
🤔 | MultiTheDuck, I pick Dam!
Dams are cool.
Iris plays with Emmett's ears.
۳ȝԗ'$ ƔȝϾ$ $ݛ ȽݛÞ $ɷɍ@ɍ ӴǼҐ@ ÞïϾԗŚ!
Zielic Translation: Can't wait to rob these guys blind!
Meaning we can get essentials...
Danny scoffs as the group heads down the stream.
They a'ight.
Emmett taps his goggles and sees the dam in the distance, along with heat signatures inside.
Yep. Looks like we found a dam.
I think it's just wooden.
Okay, so we are definitely on the right track now
Hector flies his drone back to himself and puts it back in his bag.
Doesn't look sturdy.
Don't judge.
My dad built a dam once... On his planet, not mine.
Iris sighs.
That means more fun, Seth!
t!8ball Does Chomsky run ahead to the other side of the dam
🎱 | My sources say no, PlasmaPerson.
As they get closer to the dam, Emmett stops and looks up at his partner.
Iris, what should we do?
So, who wants to scout around the dam?
In case of any ambushers and such.
t!8ball Does Iris know everything there is to know about dams?
🎱 | Yes, Jelsafan0.
Deyner catches a sight of a mouse inside of the ship's main kitchen's fridge.
Seth stops with Emmett and holds out his arms.
Dam, son.
t!8ball Does seeing the mouse attempt to heat up the spaghetti fill Deyner with determination and cause him to fix up the ship at a faster pace?
🎱 | Most likely, Deyner.
It's like an evolved form of a typical beaver dam.
I recognize the general structure.
Danny scoffs.
No more dam puns, please.
Iris puts her hand to her chin.
But... then again...
Hector snaps at Danny playfully.
I'll do whatever I dam choose to!
Emmett eyeballs the stream heading into the dam.
Think there might be fish people here?
Hector's stomach gurgles.
I hope so.
I hope not.
t!8ball Does Danny watch the stream alone in blissful serenity?
🎱 | Most likely, Platinum_Pathos.
No, the fish people would be in the water.
Not in the dam, you dorks.
Seth frowns.
I don't want to fuck a fish.
Get me closer to the dam, Emmett!
Uh, alright.
Emmett walks over to the dam and crouches close enough for Iris to study the wood.
Iris rubs her fingers on the dam, noticing teeth marks and indentations within the structure.
The teeth marks on the wood are reminiscent of a platypus--the way the sealant is packed in is consistent with their tail strength.
Why don't we head into the dam then?
Tuckered out from fixing things around the ship, Deyner decides to take a nap.
Then just go a day without sex, it's not that hard!
Hector mumbles.
I haven't had sex in like half a GUY...
Emmett looks at Garrick blankly.
I don't think I can breathe water.
Don't know about you guys.
Well all of us need to breathe, so...
Alright, then I'll go.
Garrick floats down and inspects the dam beneath the water.
No thanks.
Seth eyeballs Emmett and Iris.
I hope something that isn't furry lives here.
What if some kind of... beaver-platypus hybrid lives here?
Could be cool...
Whoa, whoa!
Emmett pretends to trip into the river, tightening his grasp to make sure Iris doesn't actually fall in.
Chomsky chuckles as he watches Emmett, thinking of a cartoon he learned about in history class ages ago.
Seth closes his eyes and smiles, fantasizing.
I hope we find a nice little female dragon that I can fuck.
Ah!
Iris cautiously laughs.
I wouldn't do that if I were you! Beavers and platypi are known to be very territorial and build their homes either immediately next to or within their dams!
Dam, I don't see anything down here.
You guys go on ahead.
Garrick goes through the dam, to the other side and hears extremely muffled yelling.
GET OUT OF MY HOUSE!
The ottori chitters angrily._
Garrick backs off from the Ottori person and yells in surprise.
Ɣɷȝ$ $ɷɍ ɷɍïï?!
Zielic Translation: What the hell?!
He very quickly goes back out.
Seth catches a whiff of Garrick's interaction over the comms.
Oh!
Emmett puts Iris down and awkwardly rests his elbow on her shoulder; it's a little uncomfortable as Iris is taller than him.
Garrick ascends to where the others are and points behind himself.
Guys, there are people there.
They're very furry.
Seth groans and unbuttons his pants.
Guess it'll have to do.
Emmett scoffs at Seth's behavior.
Iris, want to just chill up here?
Seth beats his chest and screams into the riverbed.
HEY! GIVE ME YOUR BEST WOMAN FOR ME TO FUCK PLEASE!
An ottori emerges from the dam, shaking her fist at Garrick. She has a Brooklyn accent.
Ey'! Get outta my house! What'a you doin' here?! I ain't take kindly to no teresspassas!
Danny gasps from how blatant Seth was being.
Seth, don't be rude! We don't even know who these people are!
I do not care!
I need to have sex!
Garrick flips off the Ottori woman.
Piss off, you furry old hag! I'll do what I want!
WHY YOU LITTLE-!
An Ottori man emerges, grabbing her arm.
Hey, Hey, Martha, settle it down there.
Garrick groans.
Yeah, I don't think we're gonna get much from them.
t!8ball Does Seth throw a rock at the dam causing it to crumble and kill everyone in it?
🎱 | Very doubtful, Bagelwrecker.
An Ottori walks up to the absurdly tall elf man.
Are you Ubley Cos?
I'm sorry about my wife there. She's very territorial after we were attacked last year.
Yes.
Seth puts his fists to his hips and poses.
That is I.
Iris, you okay?
The ottori bows immediately.
AH! Ubley! I apologize!
Iris remains focused on the Ottori civilians coming out of the dam.

Just saying. We're getting attacked and you're dancing.
Danny digs through his bag of food.
t!8ball Does Danny keep all of the chips and popcorn for himself?
🎱 | Yes, Platinum_Pathos.
The Llamanian ship shoots at the Panty Slingshot.
t!roll 7d100
🎱 | Rolling a 7d100... Rolled a 83, a 44, a 100, a 51, a 59, a 10, and a 70, making 417, Zander.
The shots scorch the side of the Slingshot, denting some of the lesser used rooms.
t!8ball Does Seth start to charge up Opportunity V2?
🎱 | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
After the shots from the enemy ship, Chomsky hits his head on the wall.
Gom!
Seth activates the crossbow, flipping a switch. It glows a vibrant lime green, its flight groove and risers slowly filling up with a similar glow.
EMMETT I GOT YOU A NEW PRESENT!
Emmett backs up in surprise and smiles brightly, holding out his hooves excitedly.
AHHHH! SETH, YOU BEAUTIFUL BASTARD!
It was meant to be a birthday gift, but...
Seth hands Emmett the crossbow, it nearly fully charged up.
MEET OPPORTUNITY V2!
Emmett rotates the crossbow around, admiring its grooves and features. The crossbow starts to pulsate with a familiar frequency to Opportunity.
HOLY SHIT, I LOVE IT!
Seth opens up the hatch, completely disregarding any concerns over safety.
LET'S DO A LITTLE FIRE TEST MY SON!
I would love to do that, but...
Emmett stands up, and hands Opportunity V2 back to Seth as it continues to charge.
I need to start the ship first, papi.
He quickly makes his way to the cockpit.
Garrick places all of his the stolen items on a table, sorting them by apparent value.
Iris remains on the ground and itches her arm. She really wants to bake right now.
We're gonna be rich. These idols are actual gold!
Garrick laughs maniacally.
Iris sits up straight and quickly asks the others.
Does anybody want muffins?
WHO CARES ABOUT BEING RICH GARRICK, WE'RE UNDER ATTACK!
Chomsky sighs.
As long as its not blueberry...
WE'LL BE RICH AFTER WE ESCAPE, YOU DINGUS!
t!8ball Does Emmett get the ship started?
🎱 | As I see it, yes, Zander.
Iris gives Chomsky a deadpan expression.
You have muffins, Iris?
Let's get the hell out of here...
Emmett sets the ship to ascend automatically and he leaves the cockpit to join back with Seth.
I have some coordinates, actually!
I've got no clue where they lead though.
Chomsky shrugs
Not a fan of blueberries. Worth a shot.
WE NEED TO RESCIR THE HELL OUT OF HERE!
Iris digs around in her pockets. When she doesn't find the coordinates, she curses under her breath, dashing to her room.
Seth grabs the ceiling as the ship ascends, expertly dodging from shots from the Llamanians.
OPERATION 214 MANUVER RESCIR!
When she arrives in her room, Iris begins to search the floor frantically for her map.
Come on, come on...
Emmett stumbles as the shooting Llamanians cause some turbulence.
Seth, toss me the baby!
Garrick counts the idols, more focused on his greed than the escape.
t!roll d40
🎱 | Rolling a d40... Rolled a 24, RPRetribution.
... Twenty two, twenty three, twenty four. Twenty four idols!
Garrick shakes his jazz hands.
Danny stuffs his face with some chips.
So, why exactly do we have a little Ottori girl on our ship? I thought we distinguished that kidnapping was only for dire situations.
Seth tosses the now charged Opportunity V2 to Emmett.
That dam was under attack.
I wasn't gonna leave a child to have her life taken by a fucking llama.
Fair enough.
Iris finds the piece of paper beneath her bed. She picks it up and takes a look at the coordinates excitedly.
Got it!
I didn't do it to Emmett and I wouldn't do it to any other child.
Iris dashes back to the cockpit.
Here!
She slaps the paper on the navigation console.
Emmett, Opportunity V2 should be charged, go ahead and fire it!
Seth clasps his ears preemptively.
HERE WE GO!
Emmett aims his crosshair directly at the Llamanian warship's core, tilting a bit closer to its thrusters to try and ding the engine.
t!roll 10d125
🎱 | Rolling a 10d125... Rolled a 57, a 102, a 82, a 117, a 50, a 89, a 93, a 45, a 51, and a 96, making 782, Zander.
Opportunity V2 expels a helix-shaped beam that penetrates the warship entirely, decimating the engine and causing a massive explosion in the forest. The trees begin to burn, along with the dam.
Holy fuck, this thing packs a wallop!
Garrick takes out his Specto-phone and takes a picture of the idols, getting back an approximate value of his haul from Thiefnet's calculator.
36,045 Ducketts for the gold idols... Sheesh.
Great... We stole precious heirlooms...
Chomsky stares at the idols gloomily for a second, then he takes one to his room and shuts the door.

Emmett notices that Opportunity V2 is still slightly charged; apparently his blast from before wasn't the full deal! For good measure, he shoots at the Llamanians once more with the rest of the charge.
t!roll 10d25
🎱 | Rolling a 10d25... Rolled a 3, a 14, a 20, a 18, a 17, a 5, a 2, a 23, a 5, and a 3, making 110, Zander.
The additional shot incinerates three Llamanian soldiers shooting at the crew's ship, leaving nothing but their rifles and irradiated dust.
Damn!
Emmett looks into the flight groove of his weapon in awe and deactivates Opportunity V2. This weapon is definitely not legal.
`Llamanian Soldier 3: Get into the corvettes! They can't shoot us all out if we're in a swarm formation!`
The Llamanian soldiers remaining run to their ship and start up a corvette swarm, flying directly towards the Panty Slingshot.
I honestly have no idea where these coordinates lead, but anywhere is better than here!
Upon realizing the Llamanians' strategy, Emmett shuts the ship's hatch and races to the cockpit.
Oh, shit!
Emmett slams himself into the pilot's seat and unmutes his comms, speaking into them fervently.
We need to flee! They're gaining on our tail!
Danny rolls his eyes and pops open another potato chip bag.
I would assume so...
Then get on with it already!
Emmett takes Iris's scrap of paper, sets the navigation coordinates, and presses the button to hyperspace.
Hold onto your asses!
Before the ship makes its getaway, Iris latches onto Emmett, holding onto his arm for dear life.
Seth gets launched to the back of the crew quarters.
FUCK!
I refuse!
Danny stands tall, surprisingly not budging despite the insane speed the ship was moving at.
After a couple of seconds, Emmett stops the hyperspace engines, slowing down the ship back to a reasonable speed for a crew.
Iris?
Yeah?
Iris is still gripping onto Emmett's arm.
Emmett speaks into the ship's intercom.
I think we made it...
Emmett shakes his arm in discomfort, looking back at Iris.
You can let go now. That is, unless you don't want to.
Thank King Asgorod...
Hector leaves to his room and starts decorating it with the artifacts he collected.
Oh! Right!
Iris blushes softly, letting go of Emmett's arm.
t!8ball Did a scientist ottori also stow away on the ship in the chaos?
🎱 | It is decidedly so, Bagelwrecker.
t!8ball Does the scientist take refuge in Chomsky and Garrick's room?
🎱 | It is decidedly so, Zander.
Amateurs.
Danny starts to count the amount of various food items he grabbed.
t!roll d100
🎱 | Rolling a d100... Rolled a 47, Platinum_Pathos.
Adequate. Probably would last me about... a week or two.
Hector sets his pack down in his room and sees the small laser handgun in his side pocket.
Oh, I need to give that to him soon...
He then packs the Ottori money in a small box and puts it on his shelf.
Seth enters the cockpit and raises his arms.
Praise the goddess of life for getting us out!
Seth does a little hand movement across his chest as thanks.
Emmett furrows his brow at Seth mentioning an Elven deity. When was he religious? Why would he blaspheme Squoat?
Hector grimaces.
If we ever go back, I guess we'll have some money...
Praise Squoat too, don't worry, Emmett, I recognize him as one of my gods too.
Seth pats Emmett on the back.
Yeah...
Hector leaves his room and walks to the kitchen with the laser handgun in his pocket.
Emmett, can you meet me in the kitchen for a moment?
Emmett smiles softly, getting up from the cockpit.
Okay, Hector.
I don't recognize any gods...
Danny lies on the ground, his stomach finally satiated after three bags of chips.
Seth stretches and heads to his room.
What a rough ride...
He lies back in his bed and takes a nap.
Emmett strides over to the kitchen, having a newfound confidence from escaping that deathtrap.
Danny groans.
Guess I'll be helpful.
He gets up and heads to the kitchen as well, storing the sacks full of food in the pantry and fridge.
Ah there he is!
Hector takes out the laser pistol and holds it by the barrel.
I meant to give you this a while back but never did...
He hands it over to Emmett.
Emmett fumbles with the pistol handle, his grip apparently buttery with sweat. He manages to shoot at the wall with it, narrowly missing Danny's arm.
Danny glares at Emmett, offended.
Damn it Emmett, I didn't survive llamas to get shot with a pistol!
Shit, did that hit you?!
Hector rubs his neck awkwardly.
We can get Deyner to make a better grip for you.
